thread.title: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel Friday thoroughbred card
thread.title_full: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel Friday thoroughbred card - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel Friday thoroughbred card
text:
Done EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. (AP) -- The Meadowlands Racetrack has cancelled its thoroughbred card on Friday night because of rain.
The track says heavy rain forced it to call off the races scheduled to be run on the grass.
Racing is scheduled to resume Saturday night.
Sports & Recreation Horse Racing Meadowlands Racetrack   38052/85227   3934/5000   2700/4545
